name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 421 — Empty Coop on New Year’s Day
description:
On January 1, 2026 at 07:47, MaMeeFarm™ recorded the condition of an empty duck coop at the start of the new year.

No animals were present at the time of observation.
Despite the absence of life, the act of documentation continues without interruption.

This record represents a core principle of the DGCP framework:
truth is recorded continuously — regardless of productivity, presence, or outcome.

An empty state is still a valid state of reality.
